testcase.name: should successfuly register a module along with an event and a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should trigger a handler once an event is broadcasted

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should pass on an event name and data, sent along with triggered event, to a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should route an event to process associated data invisibly, and forward everything on to a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should route an event to process associated data and forward the event along with modified data, to a handler

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should not route an event, if there is no modules registered in the CommunicationHub, for that event

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should not route an event, if routing for that event has been switched off

testcase.classname: Communication Hub test..Test event triggering, passing data between modules and event routing.
testcase.name: should not invoke handlers when a module has been deregistered by event name
